Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Mercure Hotel Aachen Europaplatz in Aachen, you'll be minutes from Ludwig Forum and close to Carolus Thermen Bad Aachen. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Eurogress Aachen and Suermondt Ludwig Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 119 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Mercure Hotel Aachen Europaplatz. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Aachen? This hotel has facilities measuring 3228 square feet (300 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Mercure Hotel Aachen Europaplatz. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ludwig Forum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Carolus Thermen Bad Aachen - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Eurogress Aachen - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Suermondt Ludwig Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
New Tivoli Stadium - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
St. Nikolaus Church - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Couven Museum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Aachen Town Hall - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Theater Aachen - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
International Newspaper Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Aachen Cathedral - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
CHIO Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Aachener Zoo - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Ponttor - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Marschiertor - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Hotel Aachen Europaplatz is Cologne (CGN-Cologne - Bonn) - 71.3 km / 44.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
